alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 01 at 2:37PM CDT until November 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Are Expected Again Wednesday... .The Red Flag Warning for today (Tuesday November 1st) continues for Kit Carson and Yuma counties through 6pm MDT. For Wednesday November 2nd, the Fire Weather Watch along and south of Interstate 70 has been upgraded to a Red Flag Warning; north of Interstate 70 the Fire Weather Watch remains. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 013, 014, 027, 028, 041, 042, AND 254... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative HUMIDITY and gusty winds, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Timing... 12pm through 6pm MDT or 1pm through 7pm CDT * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...Around 13 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
